seoTitle.default: FAQ | Frequently Asked Questions | Clensy Cleaning Services

seoMetaDescription.default: Find answers to common questions about Clensy cleaning services, booking, pricing, and more. Get the information you need about our professional cleaning.

seoKeywords.default: cleaning FAQ, cleaning questions, house cleaning FAQ, professional cleaning questions, Clensy FAQ

ogDescription.default: Get answers to your cleaning questions. Learn about our services, pricing, and booking process.

heroDescription.default: Find answers to common questions about our cleaning services, booking process, and pricing. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact us directly for personalized assistance.

questions.question: What areas do you serve?
questions.answer: We provide cleaning services throughout Northern New Jersey, including Bergen, Essex, Hudson, Passaic, and Union counties. We serve all major cities and towns within these counties.

questions.question: Are your cleaners background checked?
questions.answer: Yes, all of our cleaning professionals undergo thorough background checks before joining our team. We prioritize your safety and security, and only employ trustworthy individuals with verified credentials.

questions.question: Are you insured and bonded?
questions.answer: Yes, we are fully insured and bonded. This provides protection for both our clients and our team in the rare event of an accident or damage during service.

questions.question: What cleaning products do you use?
questions.answer: We use a combination of industry-grade professional cleaning products and eco-friendly options. If you have specific preferences or concerns about allergies, we're happy to accommodate your needs with alternative products.

questions.question: Do I need to be home during the cleaning?
questions.answer: No, you don't need to be home during the cleaning service. Many of our clients provide a key or access instructions. We ensure secure handling of all property access methods and can arrange for secure key return or storage.

stillHaveQuestionsDescription.default: Here are some other topics our customers frequently ask about.
